thread.title: Britney Spears proves she’s not that innocent with topless Instagram photo
thread.title_full: Britney Spears proves she’s not that innocent with topless Instagram photo

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Britney Spears proves she’s not that innocent with topless Instagram photo
text:
Britney Spears proves she’s not that innocent with topless Instagram photo The 35 year old looks better than ever Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
It’s hard to believe that it’s been 10 years since Britney Spears ’ infamous meltdown that saw her shave her head in full view of waiting paparazzi. 
But now the 35 year old has proved she’s finally in the best form of her life as she took to Instagram to pose completely topless. 
In the sepia snap, Britney rests one arm across her boobs as she stares seductively at the camera. 
Wearing just a layered necklace, the mum of two showed off her toned torso and flawless figure. https://www.instagram.com/p/BQtX4_agmtk/embed 
Meanwhile, Britney fans have been very vocal in their opposition to a Lifetime biopic focusing on the lead up to her infamous meltdown 10 years ago. 
The unofficial portrayal of the events leading to the infamous moment depicts revelations about her alleged sex tape, and features a strange dance off with her ex Justin Timberlake. 
It's not hit the right note with her loyal fans, who have taken to Twitter to voice their anger over the made-for-TV film Britney Ever After . Britney's fans aren't happy with the film (Photo: LIFETIME) They're angry at the portrayal (Photo: LIFETIME) 
One fan wrote: "Oops.. Lifetime did it again… and created another trash biopic of an absolute legend #BritneyEverAfter” 
Another viewer ranted: "Watching #BritneyEverAfter & i am GASPING, this ain’t right y’all, she does NOT deserve THIS!! (sic)" The film has caused controversy (Photo: LIFETIME) It's an unofficial retelling of her meltdown (Photo: LIFETIME) It will air in the UK this month (Photo: LIFETIME) 
A different user asked who would authorise such a movie, while one added: "I really can't stomach this #BritneyEverAfter" 
The pop princess is played by Australian actress Natasha Bassett, while Nathan Keyes appears in the role of JT as the first half focuses on their relationship. 
The film also portrays their breakup as the reasons for her eloping with Jason Alexander - as well as her marriage and breakup from dancer Kevin Federline. Britney Spears and Justin Timberlake (Photo: Reuters) 
While the show ends positively with her battling her demons and landing her successful Las Vegas residency, it's claimed the star isn't happy with the film. 
According to The Sun, a source said: "She is mortified that her worst moment is being dredged up again in front of millions of fans.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
